basic.description:
Seminar courses on topics in Spanish literature. Course details to be announced on website.

basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Literatura de España: Estudios independientes II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a SPAN Major or SLAS Specialization Plan or permission of the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.
